screen_desc: This screenshot is from an online shopping app, showing a product page for a headset priced at $49.99 after a 50% discount from the list price of $99.99. The product is from Amazon.com and is usually shipped within 1 to 2 months. There is an option to add the product to the cart or buy it now.

The user can now proceed to view the shopping cart and continue with checkout.
